name: Potion Blast: Battle of Wizards
description:
Embark on an epic spellcasting battle in Potion Blast – Battle of Wizards!

A fascinating couch-multiplayer versus game where you embody a wizard mixing, sipping and unleashing magical potions to blast your opponents with a mesmerizing array of spells. Only the craftiest, luckiest, and most skilled wizard will emerge victorious!



Dive into the world of Orvia and battle through its mystical lands, treacherous terrains and traps. As potions flow and the mayhem escalates, engage in epic confrontations where laughter and competition intertwine.



  • Harmonize elements by mixing potions to cast a selection of 20+ spells, each manifesting its own individualized strength.
  • Engage in adrenaline-pumping versus action with friends in 2-4 player local multiplayer battles.
  • Explore endless gameplay possibilities with a million+ combinations of variants, allowing you to redefine the rules and play your way.
  • Connect and compete with friends across the globe using Remote Play Support
  • Immerse yourself in intense battles that unfold across multiple stages, keeping you engaged and adapting to new environments throughout.
  • Prepare to receive uproarious and hilarious awards after each battle, celebrating your unmatched prowess (or perhaps highlighting your lack thereof) in side-splitting fashion!




Stay nimble, strategize wisely, and cast your spells with precision to outwit your rivals.

Unlock a realm of limitless customization by utilizing a myriad of Variants, boasting millions of combinations to revolutionize your gameplay. Opt to begin with a solitary HP, restore vitality through potion consumption, or unleash your might with a formidable spell right from the start — take control and play on your own terms!



Dive into a world of endless possibilities as you download characters crafted by the community, or tap into your modding prowess to craft a one-of-a-kind wizard persona.
Look how our penguin mascot Dyp makes a surprise landing in the world of Orvia :)


Take advantage of the remote play support, allowing a single person in your circle to bring everyone together in the game. Gather your friends for multiplayer mayhem without the need for multiple game copies!



Looking for companions to join your gaming journey? Join our welcoming Discord community, where you can connect with players, form squads, and make new friends who share your passion for gaming!



So gather your fellow wizards, embrace the pandemonium, and get ready for an unforgettable multiplayer experience! Let the best wizard win!
